phrases: Paul Edwards, date of birth is January 15th 1962. He's a 59 year old HIV positive gentleman here for hypogonadism.
Patient was last seen on November 24th 2020.
He's on 1 milliliter every 10 days, his levels were less than 300 to begin with.
He's on finasteride currently. He also takes cialis daily he takes all his pills just from me.
His other area of concern is gynecomastia which is. Which we will discuss with him today.
Last PSA was 0.66 and his last testosterone was greater than 1,500.
the testosterone's going. ... seeing some good improvements in my bloodwork.
the finasteride i'm only taking half a pill, it's the 5 milligram one.
on the days i work out i take 5 milligrams otherwise i take two and a half milligram pills, but,, i have been out of it.
look at this. ... cholesterol and triglycerides. ... 5 months later look at my numbers.
but i have n't seen a lot of data on the impact on cholesterol. Regardless, we will take it.
i also read that it- it's cardioprotective.
your red blood cell count has increased. ... it's fine though.
in terms of estrogen control i've been hearing that indole-3-carbinol, or broccoli extract, supposedly can improve my estrogen levels. Have you ever heard of it ?
your levels are fine and we checked your estra- estradiol and it was not elevated.
what about increasing my testosterone to 175 milligrams ? i'm at 140.
your peaks are getting greater than 1,500, putting you at a higher chance of needing to come off due to blood thickness.

this is why people get into problems with this stuff, ? it's, back in the day when it was n't prescribed by doctors and people would get it at gyms and stuff and they would take huge doses. And they would have a heart attack at 50.
i have a little med calendar and i put checks and ts on it. That helps me.
